Headline: #J14 Jeffery Jump Temporary Reroute Away from DuSable Lake Shore Drive
ShortDescription: Buses, in both directions, are rerouted via Jeffery, 67th, Stony Island, 57th, Hyde Park, Lake Park, 47th, King Drive, Cermak, Michigan and Balbo.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Buses, in both directions, are rerouted via Jeffery, 67th, Stony Island, 57th, Hyde Park, Lake Park, 47th, King Drive, Cermak, Michigan and Balbo.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express buses Temporary Reroute Away From DuSable Lake Shore Drive
ShortDescription: NB buses rrted via Lake Park, 47th, King Dr, & Cermak then resume normal route on Michigan. SB buses rrted via same strts, starting after Balbo/Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound buses are rerouted via Lake Park, 47th, King Drive and Cermak then resume their normal route on Michigan.
Southbound buses are rerouted via the same streets, starting after Balbo/Michigan.
Allow extra travel time.
